title: Enjoy this beautiful 2nd floor pool view! Free rent call now!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'OR Text', '61', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1036 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Our stylish and beautiful apartment homes offer a range of floor plans including one, two and three- bedroom options.', 'From in-home washers and dryers to wood-style flooring, our apartment interiors combine all the most important features you want.', 'Around the community, you can find a community garden and bike storage, making living even better beyond your front door.', 'Ideally located on East Yale Avenue in Southeast Denver, our community provides you access to dining, shopping, arts, entertainment and recreation.', 'Conveniently located near Denver Tech Center and Tamarac Square, this luxury apartment community puts you in the heart of it all in Denver, allowing you to easily access outdoor spaces such as Cherry Creek State Park and Reservoir.', 'Features:', 'In-Home Washer and Dryer, Vaulted Ceilings*, Central Air Conditioning, Pet Friendly, Smoke-Free Apartment Living, Wood-Style Flooring*, Stainless Steel Appliances*, Nest Thermostat*, USB Compatible Outlets*, Single Stream Recycling, Private Yards*, Fireplace*, Walk-In Closets, Patio or Balcony', '*In Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Complimentary Coffee and Tea Bar, Outdoor Fire Pit, Community Garden, Secure, 24-Hour Package Lockers, All Season Spa, Playground, Year-Round Resort Style Pool, Business Center, Additional Storage Available (Garages), Garages, Bike Storage, Off-Leash Dog Park, Walking and Biking Trails Nearby, Outdoor Grilling Station, Resident Lounge, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Yoga Studio, Controlled Access Gates', 'Pet Policy', 'We allow up to three pets and large breeds are welcome too.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'mO6m4FyX6']
